TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ParseChildrenAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ParseChildrenAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ParseChildrenAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定义可在开发 ASP.NET 服务器控件时使用的元数据特性。

span.span: Defines a metadata attribute that you can use when developing ASP.NET server controls.

summary.span: 使用 类指示页分析器应如何处理页上声明的服务器控件标记中嵌套的内容。

span.span: Use the class to indicate how the page parser should treat content nested inside a server control tag declared on a page.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过使用类, 您可以通过使用metadata特性标记服务器控件,为自定义服务器控件指定分析逻辑。 The class allows you to specify parsing logic for a custom server control by marking the server control with the metadata attribute. 用 metadata 特性`ParseChildren(true)`标记服务器控件将指示分析器将服务器控件标记中包含的元素解释为属性。Marking your server control with the metadata attribute `ParseChildren(true)` instructs the parser to interpret the elements that are contained within the server control's tags as properties. 在此方案中, 属性为`true`。In this scenario, the property is `true`. 用 metadata 特性`ParseChildren(true,"")`标记服务器控件, 将属性设置为传递到特性的属性的名称。Marking your server control with the metadata attribute `ParseChildren(true,"")` sets the property to the name of the property that is passed into the attribute. 使用元数据属性`ParseChildren(false)`标记服务器控件 (默认值) 指示分析器将服务器控件标记中包含的元素解释为内容, 该内容将使用与关联的关联, 作为控件。Marking your server control with the metadata attribute `ParseChildren(false)`, the default value, instructs the parser to interpret the elements that are contained within the server control's tags as content that will be parsed with an associated that is, as controls. 在此方案中, 属性为`false`。In this scenario, the property is `false`. 有关使用属性的信息, 请参阅[特性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 本节中的代码示例包含两个部分。The code example in this section contains two parts. 第一个代码示例演示如何设置类的属性。The first code example demonstrates how to set properties for the class. 第二个代码示例演示如何在 ASP.NET 页中使用类。The second code example demonstrates how to use classes in an ASP.NET page. 下面的代码示例演示如何设置名为`CollectionPropertyControl`的自定义服务器控件的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to set the object of a custom server control named `CollectionPropertyControl`. `Employee`将属性设置为`true` ,并将属性设置为类。 The sets the property to `true` and the property to the `Employee` class. [!code-csharp[ParseChildrenAttribute_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ParseChildrenAttribute_1/CS/parsechildren.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ParseChildrenAttribute_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ParseChildrenAttribute_1/VB/parsechildren.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何在 ASP.NET 页`CollectionPropertyControl`中`Employee`使用和类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `CollectionPropertyControl` and `Employee` classes in an ASP.NET page. `Employee`类的实例以声明方式添加。Instances of the `Employee` class are added declaratively. [!code-aspx-csharp[ParseChildrenAttribute_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ParseChildrenAttribute_1/CS/parsechildren.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[ParseChildrenAttribute_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ParseChildrenAttribute_1/VB/parsechildren.aspx#3)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the property to determine if the elements that are contained within a server control are parsed as properties of the server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`childrenAsProperties` 为`false`, 则服务器控件中包含的元素将被分析为控件。If `childrenAsProperties` is `false`, the elements that are contained within the server control are parsed as a control. `false`是的默认值。`false` is the default for . ## Examples 本节中的代码示例包含两个部分。The code example in this section contains two parts. 第一个代码示例演示如何设置类的属性。The first code example demonstrates how to set properties for the class. 第二个代码示例演示如何在 ASP.NET 页中使用类。The second code example demonstrates how to use classes in an ASP.NET page. 下面的代码示例演示如何为名为 `CollectionPropertyControl`的自定义服务器控件设置对象。The following code example demonstrates how to set the object for a custom server control named `CollectionPropertyControl`. 当在类定义`CollectionPropertyControl`之前声明时, 将属性设置为`true`。When the is declared before the class defining `CollectionPropertyControl`, the sets the property to `true`. [!code-csharp[ParseChildrenAttribute_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ParseChildrenAttribute_2/CS/parsechildren.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ParseChildrenAttribute_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ParseChildrenAttribute_2/VB/parsechildren.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何在 ASP.NET 页`CollectionPropertyControl`中`Employee`使用和类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `CollectionPropertyControl` and `Employee` classes in an ASP.NET page. `Employee`类的一个实例以声明方式添加, 另一个以编程方式添加。One instance of the `Employee` class is added declaratively and another is added programmatically. [!code-aspx-csharp[ParseChildrenAttribute_2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ParseChildrenAttribute_2/CS/parsechildren.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[ParseChildrenAttribute_2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ParseChildrenAttribute_2/VB/parsechildren.aspx#3)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示控件的允许的类型。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the allowed type of a control.
The control type.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果允许的控件类型为`null`, 表示未指定该类型, 则返回默认类型 , 即控件。If the allowed control type is `null`, meaning that it has not been specified, the default type, which is a control, is returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何查询属性。The following code example demonstrates how to query the property. 有关此代码示例`CollectionPropertyControl`中`Employee`使用的和类的定义, 请参见。For definitions of the `CollectionPropertyControl` and `Employee` classes that are used in this code example, see . span.span: Defines the default value for the class.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该字段的默认值为`false`, 这意味着不会将元素分析为服务器控件的属性。The default value for the field is `false`, which means that elements are not parsed as properties of the server control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultProperty { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置元素被分析为的服务器控件的默认属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the default property for the server control into which the elements are parsed.

value.span: 元素被分析为的服务器控件的默认集合属性的名称。

span.span: The name of the default collection property of the server control into which the elements are parsed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当字符串传递到构造函数时, 才会使用属性。The property is used only if a string is passed to the constructor. 创建类时, 属性将定义正在分析的服务器控件的默认属性。 When the class is created, the property defines the default property for the server control that is being parsed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何查询属性。The following code example demonstrates how to query the property. 有关此代码示例`CollectionPropertyControl`中`Employee`使用的和类的定义, 请参见。For definitions of the `CollectionPropertyControl` and `Employee` classes that are used in this code example, see . MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute ParseAsChildren
Public Shared ReadOnly ParseAsChildren As ParseChildrenAttribute

summary.span: 指示包含在服务器控件内的嵌套内容被分析为控件。

span.span: Indicates that the nested content that is contained within the server control is parsed as controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果调用了字段, 则服务器控件中包含的嵌套内容不会解析为属性; 而是将其分析为控件。If the field is called, the nested content that are contained within the server control are not parsed as properties; rather, they are parsed as a control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute ParseAsProperties
Public Shared ReadOnly ParseAsProperties As ParseChildrenAttribute

summary.span: 指示包含在服务器控件内的嵌套内容被分析为控件的属性。

span.span: Indicates that the nested content that is contained within a server control is parsed as properties of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果调用字段, 则服务器控件中包含的嵌套内容将被分析为属性。If the field is called, the nested content contained within a server control is parsed as properties.
